name: Sub-Hour
description:
Ever wanted to go outside and take a walk whilst listening to some calming music?

Yeah, me neither but I have the next best thing

Sub-Hour is a 3D Platformer where flow and preservation of momentum are key to passing every level

This game includes

- A quick 13-level campaign to speedrun

- A hidden training mode where you can run to your hearts content

- Some boppin' tracks
